attributes.action: It’s isnt the breed of dog, it’s the owners!
attributes.additional_details:
It’s the owners of these poor helpless dogs that cause dog fighting and aggression.

A dog will not be born and automatically have the instinct to attack, they have to be taught that, which is why it’s happening so much.

#freethedogs
#itstheownersnotthebreed
attributes.background:
I’m sick and tired of seeing that pit bulls and staffies etc, are being labelled as dangerous dogs. It’s the same as any other dog, it’s just some sick people out there spoil thy, and instead of bringing their dogs up with love and kindness, they use them as bait and fighting!

#freethedogs
